description: Non Material Amendment to Planning Permission 20/00155/HOU  (Erection of porch extension and a new bay window seat to south elevation. Replacement of the first and second floor windows on south elevation and installation of two roof lights) to provide changes to path route from parking bays
decision_conditions: Condition 1 of planning permission 20/00155/HOU is amended as follows:The approved development shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings/details:1909(0)001 Site Location Plan;1909(0)002 Site Plan;1909(0)050A Existing Ground Floor Plan A; 1909(0)051 Existing First Floor Plan;1909(0)052 Existing Roof Plan;1909(0)070 Existing South West Elevation;1909(0)071 Existing East Elevation;1909(0)060 Existing Section AA;1909(0)061 Existing Section BB;1909(0)100A Proposed Ground Floor Plan A;1909(0)101 Proposed First Floor Plan;1909(0)102 Proposed Roof Plan;1909(0)170 Proposed South West Elevation;1909(0)171 Proposed East Elevation;1909(0)160 Proposed Section AA;1909(0)161 Proposed Section BB;Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

The submitted Site Location Plans do not meet requirements. There must be a single red line and it must include land necessary to carry out the proposed development, i.e. land required for access to the site from a public highway. Please amend and re-submit the Site Location Plan.A Site Location Plan must be at a scale of either 1:1250 or 1:2500 which identifies the site and the surrounding area and shows at least two roads and the north point. The site should be outlined in red and any other land owned by the applicant in blue. It should include land necessary to carry out the proposed development (e.g. land required for access to the site from a public highway, visibility splays, car parking and open areas around buildings).
